description: The Corruptor (real name Jackson Day) is a fictional character, a supervillain appearing in the Marvel Comics universe. He has fought Thor and Nova (Richard Rider). His sweat glands release a chemical that overrides the social inhibition center of the brain. He first appeared in Nova #4 in December 1976 and was created by Marv Wolfman and Sal Buscema.
name: Corruptor
powers: Ability to release a victim's inhibitions
